Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Moss Roberts Vietnam War Research Files TAM 403
5 Linear Feet (5 boxes)
undated Moss Roberts (1937-) is a professor of East Asian Studies at New York University. The collection contains his research files on the Vietnam War. 1 2 3 4 5
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Moss Roberts in 2007. The accession number associated with this gift is 2007.005.
Historical/Biographical Note
Moss Roberts (1937-) is a professor of East Asian Studies at New York University.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Moss Roberts Vietnam War Research Files; TAM 403; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Scope and Content Note
The collection contains his research files on the Vietnam War.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection, created by Moss Roberts, was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Vietnam -- Politics and government -- 1945-1975. Research (document genres). Vietnam War, 1961-1975. Vietnam War, 1961-1975 -- Protest movements. Roberts, Moss, 1937- Roberts, Moss, 1937-
